title: Is AI science or technology or both? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is significant semantic overlap but science of AI can be said to be the knowledge of how to do it while it becomes technology once implemented. AI paper is a piece of science while a device is a piece of technology. But you can say that a civilization has a certain technological capability which essentially refers to the science with which they do devices. The general capability. And you can say that a research paper represents a significant technological breakthrough. So there is significant semantic overlap in practice.

Let’s understand this way ! No technology can be build without understanding the science behind it.A science will remain knowledge unless it is not converted into product .The moment some “knowledge “ is converted into product it will become “Technology “ .Read this book : The Art of Turning Data into Product eBook: DJ Patil: Amazon.in: Kindle StoreNo technology can make progress unless science behind it increase the knowledge base.
